name: Crazy Road (itch) (Arczewski)
description:
Cartoon style race traffic game. How far can you go? Unlock multiple cars or even spaceship! Use many power ups to boost your speed and score! Beat you friend or even try to be the best traffic racer in the world! Collect coins to buy new vehicles to become even faster!

Minimum requirements for smooth experience: Samsung Galaxy S3/GrandPrime

Update 1.0:

- 10 cars (1 spaceship 1 Tank)

- Power ups: speed boost, coin magnes, jet gasoline.

- LeaderBoard

- Some ingame fixes

- Awesome cartoon look

- Other cars on road

- They are crazy!

- Road obstacles and traffics

This game is well suited for children. Does not contains any violence matterial inapropriet for young gamers.
